item.title: About
item.description: Tifan Dwi Avianto is my full name. Born in Tegal, Central Java, Indonesia. I am currently pursuing a Bachelor Degree in Informatics (or Computer Science if you prefer). History Ever be grateful to get my hands early with technology since the age of 10. I since love tinkering with it. My first computer was a Pentium 4, custom PC with Windows XP on it. Long windows users, until I learn about FOSS and start to lean to it.
